node.excerpt: No more worrying about CAML syntax errors. SPQL's API, along with some utility methods, builds the CAML for you behind the scenes.
Nope. SharePoint's web services may send back XML, but SPQL handles that for you. SPQL will convert it to JSON for you.

frontmatter.title: Data the way you want it

node.excerpt: Before handing you back the results, SPQL offers to perform a number of useful transformations (e.g. aliasing, extracting ids from lookup/user field, converting *Multi fields to arrays, or even applying a custom mapper function).
